reviews.author: Jeff Bingman
reviews.review:
A diamond in the ruff.
Two Bedroom, one Bath. No frills, but for the price it's hard to beat.
On site washer and dryer, no animal restrictions as long as you know how to control them. The Manager works hard to get to your issues as soon as possible.

reviews.author: Angela Mejia
reviews.review: Nice place so far,  we receive a nice and clean apartment and Eric community  Manager is very helpful.

reviews.author: patrick tiffany
reviews.review: This place is incredible! No one is prejudice, and everyone is so eager to be neighborly!
